alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:46PM PST until December 19 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow level lowering to 800 to 1000 feet overnight into early Sunday morning, then rising to 1500 feet later Sunday morning. Total snow accumulations 3 to 9 inches. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
